content: To obtain the Mountain-Shaking Claw, you need to defeat Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake in Turtle Island in The New West. This boss requires you to have the Loong Scales.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mountain-Shaking_Claw.md', within the main section titled 'Mountain-Shaking Claw'.
The content is as follows:
To obtain the Mountain-Shaking Claw, you need to defeat Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake in Turtle Island in The New West. This boss requires you to have the Loong Scales.
